name: Goblin
description: Small, black-hearted, selfish humanoids that crave power and regularly bully other creatures weaker than themselves.

actions.name: Scimitar
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Shortbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

special_abilities.name: Nimble Escape
special_abilities.desc: The goblin can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

name: Wolf
description: A wild predator that hunts in packs, using teamwork to take down larger prey.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 11 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

special_abilities.name: Pack Tactics
special_abilities.desc: The wolf has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the wolf's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

special_abilities.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
special_abilities.desc: The wolf has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

name: Zombie
languages: Understands the languages it knew in life but can't speak
description: A mindless, shambling corpse animated by dark magic. It is slow but relentless and hard to put down.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) bludgeoning damage.

special_abilities.name: Undead Fortitude
special_abilities.desc: If damage reduces the zombie to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the zombie drops to 1 hit point instead.

name: Orc
description: A savage, green-skinned raider with a lust for battle and conquest.

actions.name: Greataxe
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d12 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Javelin
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

special_abilities.name: Aggressive
special_abilities.desc: As a bonus action, the orc can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

name: Owlbear
description: A terrifying hybrid of bear and owl, known for its ferocity and terrifying screech. It attacks anything it encounters.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The owlbear makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its claws.

actions.name: Beak
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 10 (1d10 + 5) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) slashing damage.

special_abilities.name: Keen Sight and Smell
special_abilities.desc: The owlbear has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight or smell.

name: Mimic
description: A cunning predator that can alter its shape to resemble an inanimate object, most often a chest or door, to lure prey.

actions.name: Pseudopod
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage. If the mimic is in object form, the target is subjected to its Adhesive trait.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) acid damage.

special_abilities.name: Shapechanger
special_abilities.desc: The mimic can use its action to polymorph into an object or back into its true, amorphous form. Its statistics are the same in each form.

special_abilities.name: Adhesive (Object Form Only)
special_abilities.desc: The mimic adheres to anything that touches it. A creature adhered to the mimic is also Grappled by it.

special_abilities.name: False Appearance (Object Form Only)
special_abilities.desc: While the mimic remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary object.

name: Troll
description: A lanky, rubbery-skinned giant with a voracious appetite and a terrifying ability to regenerate from wounds.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The troll makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.

special_abilities.name: Keen Smell
special_abilities.desc: The troll has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

special_abilities.name: Regeneration
special_abilities.desc: The troll regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If the troll takes acid or fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of its next turn. The troll dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

name: Young Green Dragon
senses: Blindsight 30 ft., Darkvision 120 ft., Passive Perception 17
description: A cunning, manipulative, and treacherous dragon that lairs in forests. It delights in ambush, poison, and corrupting lesser creatures.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The dragon makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.

special_abilities.name: Amphibious
special_abilities.desc: The dragon can breathe air and water.

legendary_actions.name: Detect
legendary_actions.desc: The dragon makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.

legendary_actions.name: Tail Attack
legendary_actions.desc: The dragon makes a tail attack.

legendary_actions.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The dragon beats its wings. Each creature within 10 feet must succeed on a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw or take 13 (2d6 + 6) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone.
